attributes.additional_details: Give people who work full/part time first choice of housing ( first time buyers trying very hard to get onto the property ladder) get tougher on people mocking the benefits & stop giving them out to certain people ( people who cant speak a word of English & dont want to work & others who cant stop producing loads of kids. The list I'm sure goes on. Too late to realise this country is in a huge mess & is affecting myself & many others. Why did we let this happen in the first place? should have been sorted out many years ago.
